methods.addPreview:
Adds a data type to be converted to a Preview Type.

Note: Java generics information - <S,
D extends io.deephaven.db.tables.remote.preview.PreviewType>

:param sourceType: (java.lang.Class<S>) - the type to convert
:param destType: (java.lang.Class<D>) - the Preview type to convert to
:param function: (java.util.function.Function<S,D>) - the function that applies the conversion
methods.applyPreview:
Iterates over a tables columns and applies a preview (or wraps non-serializable).

:param table: (io.deephaven.db.tables.Table) - the table to apply the preview
:return: (io.deephaven.db.tables.Table) the table containing the preview columns
methods.isColumnTypeDisplayable:
Indicates if a column type is displayable by the client. This is used to screen out unknown classes,
 unserializable, and anything else that should not be displayed.

:param type: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the column type
:return: (boolean) true if the type can be displayed by the client, false otherwise.
methods.isOnWhiteList:
Indicates if a type is on the white list created from user defined properties.

:param type: (java.lang.Class<?>) - the class type
:return: (boolean) true if it is on the white list, false otherwise

text: Converts large data types to Preview types. Also wraps non-serializable data types to be serializable.
